channel.title: Comments on: Applying Kanban to IT Processes (Part 1)
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.dc:creator: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.description: Fabrice: Thanks you for the work, I appreciate it. Please feel free to translate the rest of the series, provide you attribute me as the author and link back to the originals. We'd appreciate it if you ask before translating any other articles or series's on the site, however.
item.content:encoded: Fabrice: Thanks you for the work, I appreciate it. Please feel free to translate the rest of the series, provide you attribute me as the author and link back to the originals. We’d appreciate it if you ask before translating any other articles or series’s on the site, however.

item.title: By: Fabrice Aimetti
item.dc:creator: Fabrice Aimetti
item.content:encoded:
Hello Eli,

I have translated into french your post :
http://www.fabrice-aimetti.fr/dotclear/index.php?post/2011/07/07/Appliquer-Kanban-aux-processus-informatiques-1

I plan to translate your other four posts.

Regards,
Fabrice

item.title: By: David Forck (thirster42)
item.dc:creator: David Forck (thirster42)
item.description: Awesome article. I've been hearing about Kanban for a while, but the descriptions i got were very lacking. Can't wait for the next article.
item.content:encoded: Awesome article. I’ve been hearing about Kanban for a while, but the descriptions i got were very lacking. Can’t wait for the next article.

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: This is very interesting...we are doing scrum where I work and I will be waiting for your next installment in this series....good article
item.content:encoded: This is very interesting…we are doing scrum where I work and I will be waiting for your next installment in this series….good article
